title: Winter 2025 Restaurants – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content: Winter 2025 Restaurants – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week Winter 2025 Restaurants Restaurants Winter 2025 Restaurants Pittsburgh Restaurant Week Winter 2025 • Monday, January 13 to Sunday, January 19 Early Access Weekend: Friday, January 10 to Sunday, January 12 Annual Winter Theme: “New Dishes for the New Year” Restaurant Week Tips MAKE RESERVATIONS. Most locations accept reservations during restaurant week to streamline their customer service. For restaurants that do not offer online reservations, call to inquire about a dining time. MENTION RESTAURANT WEEK. When being seated and offered menus, ensure to mention Pittsburgh Restaurant Week to the waitstaff to ensure you are getting the correct menus and pricing. GRATUITIES APPRECIATED. Waitstaff handle a surge of customers during restaurant week and many of the special menus are multiple courses that would have been priced higher if ordered a la carte. If you are able, consider gratuities that take into account the original pricing and extra effort to perfect a multi-course service. title: Restaurants – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content: Restaurants – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week Restaurants Pittsburgh Restaurant Week features dining specials which highlight the wide-ranging dining options that Pittsburgh has to offer and brings individuals from surrounding boroughs or suburbs to the city to walk the streets and enjoy a meal at a special discounted price. Check out the Pittsburgh Restaurant Week participating restaurants for the next celebration: :: PRW Summer 2024, August 12-18, early access August 9 See some past Pittsburgh Restaurant Week participating restaurants: :: PRW Winter 2024, January 15-21, early access January 12 :: PRW Summer 2023, August 7-13 :: PRW Winter 2023, January 9-15 :: PRW Summer 2022, August 8-14, extended to August 21 :: PRW Winter 2022, January 10-16, extended to January 23 :: PRW Summer 2021, August 9-15, extended to August 22 :: PRW Winter 2021, January 11-17, extended to January 24 :: PRW Summer 2020, August 10-16, extended to August 23 :: PRW Winter 2020, January 13-19 :: PRW Summer 2019, August 12-18 :: PRW Winter 2019, January 14-20 :: PRW Summer 2018, August 13-19 :: PRW Winter 2018, January 15-21 :: PRW Summer 2017, August 14-20 :: PRW Winter 2017, January 9-15 :: PRW Summer 2016, August 15-21 :: PRW Winter 2016, January 11-17 :: PRW Summer 2015, August 10-16 :: PRW Winter 2015, January 12-18 :: PRW Summer 2014, August 11-17 :: PRW Winter 2014, January 13-19 :: PRW Summer 2013, August 12-18 :: PRW Winter 2013, January 14-20 :: PRW Summer 2012, August 13-19 :: PRW Winter 2012, January 16-22

title: Andora Restaurant – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content: Andora Restaurant – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week Andora Restaurant Winter 2025 Restaurants Andora Restaurant ADDRESS1616 Mt Nebo Rd, Sewickley, PA 15143 (Map) PHONE(412) 749-5245 NEIGHBORHOODSewickley WEBSITE andorarestaurant.com MENU STARTS EARLY Restaurant Week Special: $20.25 Specialty Item FEATURED DISH Australian rack of lamb (two bones), Cajun dusted and grilled to your specific temperature served with jasmine rice and sautéed asparagus tossed in our house butter. Finished with a rosemary bourbon glaze *Please note that no promotions or certificates are able to be used with this meal. EDIT: On January 15, the restaurant notified PRW to update the description from 1/2 rack to two bones. Available for dine-in only. Not available for online, takeout or to-go orders. ADVERTISEMENT

title: Bonfire food & drink – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week
content: Bonfire food & drink – Pittsburgh Restaurant Week Bonfire food & drink Winter 2025 Restaurants Bonfire food & drink ADDRESS2100 E Carson Street. Pittsburgh PA 15203 (Map) PHONE(412) 481-3473 NEIGHBORHOODSouthside WEBSITE bonfire-pgh.com RESERVE ON OPENTABLE SUSTAINABLE DINING WALK-INS WELCOME NEW DISH, NEW YEAR Restaurant Week Special: $45.25 DINNER First Course Salmon Tartare avocado, chipotle crema, crispy tortilla Wedge Salad crumbled blue, bacon jam, buttermilk vinaigrette Rosemary butternut squash bisque crispy prosciutto, crème fraiche, black pepper Second Course Wagyu Beef Meatloaf goat cheese and chive whipped potatoes, crispy onions, blistered tomato jam Italian sausage rigatoni charred peppers, fennel, ricotta, herb crumb Wood-fired octopus Crispy potatoes, broccolini, red pepper vinaigrette, manchego Dessert Lemon olive oil cake Basil whip, pistachio S’mores Dark chocolate cremeaux, marshmallow fluff graham cracker, chocolate crumble Available for dine-in only. Not available for online, takeout or to-go orders. ADVERTISEMENT
